body:
Well , she is a bitch who dont deserve much but these guys dont either. 
The teacher is the only one who deserv revenge cinnda....
He stil fuck a child and he has no excuse . I know she was doing it because of her mother and bug father but she is a bitch , destroying a lot of peole life and i dont think she deserv a better life .
They shuld die all of them and thats it , and that knight was a cringe one for me . I didn't even get a boner from this .....

...I dont understand the another story ending at all? Why do they go from this girl eating that guys ass to suddenly she reveals shes pregnant and its like this happy "they're all together again" ending?? Like, what happened to that guy? The first part of the another story felt incomplete too but atleast i somewhat feel like i can put the pieces together, but these last chapters....I got nothing
This author always creates annoying females that end up getting better things than they deserve.
